name: Introduction to Ethnomusicology
description: A survey of the field of ethnomusicology, its history, methods, and relevant research.

name: Music Theory
description: An introduction to the fundamentals of music theory.

name: Music History
description: A survey of the history of music from the middle ages to the present day.

name: Instrumental Performance
description: An introduction to the fundamentals of instrumental performance.

name: Ethnomusicology Research Methods
description: A survey of the methods of ethnomusicology research.

name: Ethnomusicology Theory and Practice
description: An introduction to the theories and practices of ethnomusicology.

name: Advanced Ethnomusicology
description: An in-depth exploration of the theories and practices of ethnomusicology.
